service.name: CheckIn
service.tagline: Handle transparent Single Sign-On from multiple heterogeneous identity providers
service.description: This service provides AAI services for both service providers and users. Main features: enables federated access to services, connection with the CILogon TTS, enables multiple federated authentication sources using different technologies, direct integration with the communities AAI services, user registration portal to allow accounts-linking.
service.targetUsers: EGI service providers, Research communities, Both end-users and service managers
service.userValue: Integrate different through sources of identities, increased productivity and security.
service.funding: Development: EC H2020 projects (primarily) and national projects/open source projects. Operations: EGI participant fees + in-kind contribution from service providers
